Coming to recipe, today I prepared my lovely evening snack it's Vankaya Bajji / Brinjal fries I love these Bajji's a lot like to have them when they're hot, it's perfect winter treat â„ï¸ I enhanced the taste of Bajji stuffing with onion, grated carrot, Masala powder and lemon juice. I hope you definitely enjoy it Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Brinjals/ Egg plants - 10 - small ( X - cut )
Batter:
  • Bengal gram flour - 240 gms
  • Rice flour - 80 gms
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Ajwain / carom seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Turmeric powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Baking soda - 1/4 tsp
Red chilly onion chutney: ( Stuffing )
  • You can checkout link belowÂ Red Chilly Onion Chutney/ Erra karam Chutney
Onion and Masala stuffing:
  • Onion - 1 - medium - finely chopped
  • Carrot - 1/2 - grated
  • Cilantro / Coriander leaves - 1/4 cup - finely chopped
  • Lemon juice - 1 tb sp
Mixed Masala Powder:
  • Red chilly powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Chaat Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Coriander powder - 1/2 tsp
Procedure: Cook Brinjal:
  • In a mixing bowl/ medium bowl add 1 liter water and 1 tsp salt
  • When water started boiling add Brinjal
  • Cover with lid and cook 10 mins
  • Turn off heat
  • Drain water and take out Brinjal aside
  • Â Let them become cool
Stuffing Brinjal:
  • Add 1 tb sp red chilly onion chutney in each Brinjal
  • Keep all Brinjal in a plate
Batter:
  • In a bowl Add all batter ingredients
  • Mix well
  • Add water little by little and make medium thickness Â of batter consistency
Vankaya Bajji:
  • Take one Brinjal and cover it with batter, slowly drop in medium heated oil
  • Repeat the same process add three Brinjal in oil
  • Flip bajji slowly when it changes golden brown and take out on paper towel
  • When all Brinjal fries are done
  • You can serve them directly or
  • Let them become cool and make masala vankaya Bajji
Onion and masala stuffing vankaya Bajji:
  • Chop a straight cut on Brinjal fries for stuffing
  • Add toppings onion, Carrot, coriander leaves, lemon juice & Mixed Masala Powder
  • You can also add nylon sev on toppings to extra zest ğŸ™‚
  • Serve immediately and enjoy withÂ Red Chilly Onion Chutney/ Erra karam Chutney
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • Instead of Brinjal you can also use Bajji mirchi ( Green chillies for Bajji )
